carl.abr.gui

Class My_spinner

  • java.lang.Object
    • Spinner
      • carl.abr.gui.My_spinner

  • public class My_spinner
extends Spinner
    Spinner class (drop down menu) used to select the IP address of the server and port number for the TCP socket.
    Can save the items in a file when calling addItem(String), and load them when calling set_file_name(String).
    See Also:
    Spinner, set_file_name(String)

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addItem(java.lang.String item)
      Adds the selected item to the end of the the_arrayAdapter, and saves it in the file.
      void clearItems()
      Removes all items from the list and disable it

      Returns the current selected item.

      Removes the selected item from the the_arrayAdapter, and from the file.
      void set_file_name(java.lang.String name)
      Set the name of the file used for this spinner, and reads this file to add items to the spinner by calling initialize().

    • Method Detail

      • set_file_name

        public void set_file_name(java.lang.String name)
        Set the name of the file used for this spinner, and reads this file to add items to the spinner by calling initialize().
        Parameters:
        name - : name of the file
        See Also:
        Spinner, #initialize()}

      • addItem

        public void addItem(java.lang.String item)
        Adds the selected item to the end of the the_arrayAdapter, and saves it in the file.
        Parameters:
        item - : String to be added to the spinner

      • remove_item

        public boolean remove_item()
        Removes the selected item from the the_arrayAdapter, and from the file.
        Returns:
        boolean: true if there are still items that can be removed, false if the spinner is empty.

      • getSelected

        public java.lang.String getSelected()
        Returns the current selected item.
        Returns:
        String: selected item
        null: if spinner is empty

      • clearItems

        public void clearItems()
        Removes all items from the list and disable it
